basics.name: Sharat S.A.
basics.label: Materials researcher with a core competency in analytical chemistry and electrochemistry [cite: 5]
basics.summary: Materials researcher with four years of experience across multiple cell chemistries, electrocatalysis and organic transistors from simulation to synthesis[cite: 5, 6]. Currently working with All-Solid-State Batteries (ASSBs)[cite: 7]. Believes in bridging science and society through outreach and policy research[cite: 7].

work.name: Indian Institute of Science Bangalore
work.summary: Compiling data, literature review and theoretical calculations for a manuscript in preparation[cite: 29].
highlights: Executing cycling-EIS-DRT tests to investigate Li/LLZO interface [cite: 30]

work.name: IISER, Mohali
work.summary: Isolated the stabilisation effect of weak F-bonding in fluorinated sp² molecules by modelling CF- interactions using Gaussian09 on real molecules from the Cambridge Structural Database[cite: 32].

work.name: Indian Institute of Science Bangalore
work.summary: Acoustic and impedance analysis of solid electrolytes[cite: 33].
highlights: Established a broad-band EIS-DRT setup for solid electrolytes (LLZO, LPSCI), leading to quantifiable improvements in interfacial stability in half-cell and bilayer configurations[cite: 35].

Evaluated improvements to LLZO synthesis using DRT, demonstrating limitations to achieving high density LLZO and highlighting the critical role of grain-boundary phases in bulk and interfacial electro-mechanics[cite: 36].
Conducted theoretical and experimental investigations into probe design for acoustic analysis of solid-state cells[cite: 37].

work.name: Max Planck Institute für Eisenforschung, Düsseldorf
work.summary: Unravelled the role of iron in bimetallic Ni-Fe catalysts for the Oxygen Evolution Reaction (OER) by study design and systematic physical (XPS) and electrochemical (CP) characterisation, subsequently coupling both via operando Raman spectroscopy[cite: 42].

work.name: Indian Institute of Science, Bangalore
work.summary: Engineered hermetically sealing polymeric chambers through material simulation and iterative design and testing, enabling the first low-temperature charge transport measurements on mixed ionic-electronic organic transistors in an aqueous environment[cite: 46].
highlights: Fabricated and electrochemically characterised Organic Electrochemical Transistors on interdigitated electrodes[cite: 47].

work.name: Indian Institute of Technology, Delhi
work.summary: Reading project with simulation work to set up the pseudo-2D model in COMSOL Multiphysics for calculating capacity loss in Li-ion cells based on SEI growth towards a large-model study[cite: 49].

volunteer.position: Elected student council member and academic liaison [cite: 72]
volunteer.summary: Represented ~250 peers as an elected student council member and academic liaison in administrative meetings[cite: 72].

Directed the cooperative mess since its inception, serving as President of the first council[cite: 74]. Designed its fiscal structure, constitution and operational policies, growing annual revenue to 4 Crore INR while supervising 20+ employees, managing a team of 14 council members and handling accounts, logistics and vendor negotiations[cite: 75].
Served as Junior Editor (2021-2022) and Managing Editor (2022-2023)[cite: 77]. Conceptualised and designed the institute's first student newspaper, heading design[cite: 77].
